Package domain

Class WarenkorbVerwaltung

java.lang.Object
domain.WarenkorbVerwaltung
public class WarenkorbVerwaltung extends Object
Manages the shopping cart operations for customers.

  • Method Details

    • getWarenkorb

      public Warenkorb getWarenkorb(Nutzer authuser)
      Retrieves the shopping cart for a given authenticated user (customer).
      Parameters:
      authuser - the authenticated user
      Returns:
      the shopping cart of the customer

    • inWarenKorbLegen

      public void inWarenKorbLegen(Artikel artikel, int anzahl, Nutzer authuser) throws PackungsGrosseException, AnzahlException
      Adds an article to the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      artikel - the article to add
      anzahl - the quantity of the article to add
      authuser - the authenticated user (customer)
      Throws:
      PackungsGrosseException - if the quantity does not match packaging size for mass articles
      AnzahlException - if the quantity exceeds the available stock

    • kaufen

      public void kaufen(Nutzer authuser)
      Completes the purchase.
      Parameters:
      authuser - the authenticated user (customer)

    • Warenkorbleeren

      public void Warenkorbleeren(Nutzer authuser)
      Empties the shopping cart of the customer.
      Parameters:
      authuser - the authenticated user (customer)

    • artikelMengeaendern

      public void artikelMengeaendern(int artikelNummer, int neueAnzahl, Nutzer authuser) throws AnzahlException, Artikelnamenichtgefunden
      Changes the quantity of an article in the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      artikelNummer - the article number to change
      neueAnzahl - the new quantity of the article
      authuser - the authenticated user (customer)
      Throws:
      AnzahlException - if the new quantity exceeds the available stock
      Artikelnamenichtgefunden - if the article with specified number is not found

    • checkArtikelwarenkorb

      public boolean checkArtikelwarenkorb(String artikelname, Nutzer authuser)
      Checks if an article with specified name is in the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      artikelname - the name of the article to check
      authuser - the authenticated user (customer)
      Returns:
      true if the article is in the shopping cart, false otherwise

    • aktualisiereArtikelbestandInDatei

      public void aktualisiereArtikelbestandInDatei(Warenkorb warenkorb)
      Updates the stock levels of articles in the file after purchase.
      Parameters:
      warenkorb - the shopping cart
